infos.value: Wait here. I'll call a white mage right away.
I-I'll be fine. I know...how to stop the bleeding. This wound, it's...it's not so...
Rairyuu, a shinobi of Gouga in the employ of Muraga.
Yes. It would appear we no longer need to stay our hand with Muraga.
I caught sight of Sadali's entourage making their way north.
«Nitor» is also en route for Wezette. We must inform them at once.
I will go and inform Sir Adelard.
Don't be foolish. Your wounds must be allowed to heal first.
There's no time for that, I'm afraid. No one is better suited for this mission than I am.
